title: Pillow top
description: Damask square (pillow top_ of grey-green satin with repeat design of large floral spray of roses, leaves and half open pomegranate; from this, above, springs, ruined stone arch, a tree, and view of tower and house woven in pale blue. Rest of design in naturalistic colors. Fragments of gold galloon edge.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
